pullrequest.title: src/systems/physics/CMakeLists.txt: use TARGET_SO_NAME to fix finding dartsim plugin

content.raw:
Running `ign-gazebo` from debs gives the following error message:

~~~
[Err] [Physics.cc:218] Unable to load the /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1.0.0 library.
~~~

[Physics.cc:218](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/9e7b0c4ae5d82c53d3818083b4d455f44c1e21ae/src/systems/physics/Physics.cc?at=ign-gazebo1&fileviewer=file-view-default#Physics.cc-199:218) tries to load the dartsim plugin given by `dartsim_plugin_LIB`, but using [TARGET_FILE](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.3/manual/cmake-generator-expressions.7.html) causes the full library version to be appended. Using `TARGET_SONAME_FILE` causes just the major version to be appended.
content.html:
Running ign-gazebo from debs gives the following error message:

[Err] [Physics.cc:218] Unable to load the /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1.0.0 library.

Physics.cc:218 tries to load the dartsim plugin given by dartsim_plugin_LIB, but using TARGET_FILE causes the full library version to be appended. Using TARGET_SONAME_FILE causes just the major version to be appended.
